roots.label: create User With Email And Password

settings.headCode:
<script type="module">
  // Import the functions you need from the SDKs you need
  import { initializeApp } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/10.7.2/firebase-app.js";
  import { getAuth, createUserWithEmailAndPassword, signInWithEmailAndPassword, onAuthStateChanged } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/10.7.2/firebase-auth.js";
  import { getFirestore } from "https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/10.7.2/firebase-firestore.js";

  // Add SDKs for Firebase products  you want to use
  // https://firebase.google.com/docs/web/setup#available-libraries

  // Your web app's Firebase configuration
  // For Firebase JS SDK v7.20.0 and later, measurementId is optional
  const firebaseConfig = {
    apiKey: "AIzaSyCaPVTsEYQzmx00TqV09oyqEVfPkMyim9E",
    authDomain: "uscape-219cc.firebaseapp.com",
    projectId: "uscape-219cc",
    storageBucket: "uscape-219cc.appspot.com",
    messagingSenderId: "83616129510",
    appId: "1:83616129510:web:d2a294cc5670da40b83627",
    measurementId: "G-F6F7NF9DCM"
  };

  // Initialize Firebase
  const app = initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
  const auth = getAuth(app);
  const db = getFirestore(app);

  // Set the firebaseApp object to the global 'window' object and expose it to the global scope
  window.firebaseApp = app;
  window.firebaseAuth = auth;
  window.firebaseDB = db;

  // Function for user sign-up
  window.signUpUser = function(email, password) {
  return createUserWithEmailAndPassword(window.firebaseAuth, email, password);
  };

  // Function for user sign-in
  window.signInUser = function(email, password) {
  return signInWithEmailAndPassword(window.firebaseAuth, email, password);
  };

  // Function to get the currently signed-in user
  window.getCurrentUser = function() {
    return window.firebaseAuth.currentUser;
  };
  
  // Observer for user state
  onAuthStateChanged(window.firebaseAuth, (user) => {
    if (user) {
      // User is signed in
      // Perform actions based on the sign-in state here
    } else {
      // User is signed out
      // Handle the sign-out state here
    }
  });

}
</script>
